description: Kent Police says the passenger of the lorry, a man in his 20s, was confirmed dead at the scene.
title: A299: Man dies as lorry crashes into road sweeper in Kent
title_page: A299: Man dies as lorry crashes into road sweeper in Kent - BBC News
maintext:
A man has died after a lorry crashed into a stationary road sweeper in Kent.
The incident happened on the A299 at St Nicholas-at-Wade at about 18:50 GMT on Tuesday.
A white Fiat Ducato lorry was travelling towards London when it crashed into the stationary Iveco Daily road sweeper, police said.
The passenger of the lorry, a man in his 20s, was confirmed dead at the scene.
